entry.title: Podcast Trailer is Up
entry.content:
Hey everyone! There’s a short intro for the show up now on iTunes

Just gives some basic info on the show but the best bit is you can now subscribe!

Listen here or on iTunes

Or using the following URL: http://letsmakebillions.libsyn.com/rss

Follow Let’s Make Billions on social media!

  • Twitter
  • Instagram
  • Facebook

Podcast Trailer is Up was originally published by Simon Cumming at Let's Make Billions Podcast on August 04, 2016.

entry.title: Now Live in iTunes Store
entry.content:
Let’s Make Billions is now up in the iTunes store!

  • iTunes Store - Let’s Make Billions

If iTunes isn’t your thing then the url is: http://letsmakebillions.libsyn.com/rss

Just add that to whatever you listen to podcasts through and all will be good!

Have added a little intro to the podcast for now but the first 3 Episodes will drop August 15th! Woohoo!

Subscribe now and get it in your little ear holes!

Now Live in iTunes Store was originally published by Simon Cumming at Let's Make Billions Podcast on August 04, 2016.

entry.title: Launches August 15
entry.content:
This is it!

Launch date is set.

Let’s Make Billions launches August 15!

Put it in your bloody calendars!

But for now follow us on social media:

  • Twitter - @billionspod
  • Instagram - @billionspod
  • Facebook

Launches August 15 was originally published by Simon Cumming at Let's Make Billions Podcast on August 02, 2016.

entry.title: Welcome to The Podcast
entry.content:
Hey everyone! This is the website for my brand new podcast!

I really want to start a business but haven’t found the exact right idea yet, thankfully I have some friends to help me out.

Murphy McLachlan & I create a bar for dogs, Kate Dehnert & I devise a truly evil kebab directory app and Tessa Ryan concocts the most lucrative baby sitting service of all time.

The podcast should launch in the next few weeks, but for now follow us on social media to get updates as soon as the first episode hits!

  • Twitter
  • Instagram
  • Facebook

Welcome to The Podcast was originally published by Simon Cumming at Let's Make Billions Podcast on May 24, 2016.
